statements: DELETE FROM medical_procedures WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND date_performed < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM medical_procedures WHERE id = 10 AND patient_id = 100
DELETE FROM medical_procedures WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND date_performed = '2022-05-15'
DELETE FROM surgeries WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND operation_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM medical_notes WHERE patient_id = 100 AND physician_name = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM surgery_log WHERE patient_id = 101 AND surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
